content.rendered:
NEW DENIM RULES

Summer is here, and I love trying out different denim looks mixing with high to low tops and accessories. It’s interesting how denim in general never goes out of style. We do have different denim looks like what’s popular in 2019 ’90s and ’80s style…. but denim is always big business. The new hot denim trend now is the ’80s look with a modern twist like adding biker shorts under denim shorts. Try some of these fun denim looks and just have fun with it! Remember, the new denim rules is that there are no rules.

-D’LASHES NEWS: I’m adding tons of new D’Lashes products like these popular candles that my clients love now in rose gold and black!-

Also, I’m still obsessed with vintage bags like Fendi, Prada, and Dior saddle bags that are super popular at the moment. If you have one in your closet then it’s time to get them out! If you want to invest in a good quality designer vintage bag then I recommend getting them from therealreal.com. The Real Real company just went public on the stock market so you know this will continue to be big. Look and bow earrings are from  FWRD.COM 

P.S. Get ready for Summer getaways and adventures with perfect lashes! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only).  Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here.  

LOVE DIONNE
